resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

worklogs.comment:
pcmoritz opened a new pull request #2019: [DON'T MERGE] Attempt to fix ARROW-2552
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2019
 
 
   I can't reproduce it locally, trying a few travis runs.

----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description:
Currently Python unittests fail randomly in Plasma:
{code:java}
--------------------------- Captured stderr teardown ---------------------------
==20552== Invalid free() / delete / delete[] / realloc()
==20552==    at 0x4C2C83C: operator delete[](void*) (in /usr/lib/valgrind/vgpreload_memcheck-amd64-linux.so)

comments.body: Judging from the backtrace, it could also have been introduced in [https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/b916c797833541299f9c3adc6e24d109359b7a6c]
This might have been a caching glitch, I think it is fixed now. If anybody sees this error please re-open this issue.
